+# Usage:
body:
There are a few reasons, but the most important:
Many people come to me saying they need clarifications on what exactly jenkins runs.
ci_parameterized_build.sh tries to do too much for any bash script, and I usually need to spend many hours with people tracking the script and distilling what it executes with them, so they can finally go back and start debugging problems.

So clarifying the script like this will free up a lot of my time and a lot of people's time when they need to see what is run by the CI, but it will add some code duplication. I think it is a worthy exchange.

body_text:
There are a few reasons, but the most important:
Many people come to me saying they need clarifications on what exactly jenkins runs.
ci_parameterized_build.sh tries to do too much for any bash script, and I usually need to spend many hours with people tracking the script and distilling what it executes with them, so they can finally go back and start debugging problems.
So clarifying the script like this will free up a lot of my time and a lot of people's time when they need to see what is run by the CI, but it will add some code duplication. I think it is a worthy exchange.
